backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Describes two UI modification features targeting LastChanceNoModal.tsx, including removing a cat-related line and replacing the cat with a panda asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, hooks, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the ValentineProposal component inside a full-screen container.
frontend/src/components/FloatingThoughts: Interactive word-and-heart animation component that reacts to hover and click with scaling and color transitions.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveLoveL: Displays an interactive multi-paragraph love letter with progressive reveal, navigation controls, and progress indicators.
frontend/src/components/LastChanceNoModa: Modal showing an angry panda image and last‑chance message with options to confirm Yes or close the dialog.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Main proposal flow with Yes/No buttons, evasive No behavior, modal trigger, progressive notes, and follow‑up components.
frontend/src/content/valentineCopy.ts: Provides proposal text, love notes, progressive notes, and the full love letter content used across components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveButton.ts: Provides logic for moving a button to random non-colliding positions within a container to avoid obstacles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for handling login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, a pink-themed color system, animations, and utility classes for decorative backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including feature requirements to replace an angry cat with an angry panda and remove specific UI text.
